nodes.text: A T3 web comber first appeared in the 1999 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The device was first named in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations. The name originated in the 2000 Star Wars Legends reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I, which which was written by Kristin Lund.
